amendment.description: To offset the increased spending authorized by this Act by temporarily prohibiting the expenditure of any Federal funds by the United States Agency for International Development other than spending for Israel.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5184, under the order of 8/2/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 7 - 90. Record Vote Number: 277.

action.text: Amendment SA 5184 proposed by Senator Paul. (consideration: CR S3846; text: CR S3846) To offset the increased spending authorized by this Act by temporarily prohibiting the expenditure of any Federal funds by the United States Agency for International Development other than spending for Israel.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5184, under the order of 8/2/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 7 - 90. Record Vote Number: 277.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5184, under the order of 8/2/22, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 7 - 90. Record Vote Number: 277.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5184 proposed by Senator Paul.
